website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option with 4 easy-to-operate lighting modes. 2 light bulbs per pack and a lightweight price tag make this a smart choice for budget-conscious buyers.
pros: Offers 4 separate modes: flame emulation, upside down, breathing, and general light
Attractive price point for a pack of 2
Flame effect is impressive, especially for the price
No noticeable dots or distracting pixelation
Comes in single mode, 4 mode, and blue
cons: Flickering can be somewhat intense and predictable
Large size might not fit in smaller lamps

customer_reviews.title: They Really Look Like Medieval Torches
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon these while looking for other lights. Their low price caused me to buy them as we approached Christmas because I'm always looking for that thing that other people don't have. I am happy to be the only one in our neighborhood with these because they have created a lot of attention. We had three people come to our door asking "Where did you get these? They are so realistic looking!" And they are! They are very cool, but they don't give good light for identifying anyone at the front door. They are strictly for mood and effect. I have put them away until Halloween. These are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Geepeegee

customer_reviews.title: ... be delivered but when they did I was not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for the two I ordered to be delivered but when they did I was not disappointed at all. The flame looks exceptionally realistic and I could not be more pleased with the flickering effect it provides. The color is very close to that depicted in the pictures and provides a warm naturalistic yellow glow. It really looks as if I have two gas lamps on the front of my house and is exactly the look I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: but they're fine for exterior covered areas or interior rooms where one ...
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs cast a realistic flame effect and are exactly what I wanted for my front porch and covered breezeway light fixtures. Some reviewers have reported these emit a dim light - and to be honest - the flame effect is not as bright as other bulbs, but they're fine for exterior covered areas or interior rooms where one wants a warm ambiance and not a light for reading, etc. Imagine an event with torch lights and that's the effect one gets. I only wish they had the same bulb in chandelier base size for my deck light fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Gamauha

customer_reviews.title: Flickering flame effect, amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these on a Facebook ad and thought it was a brilliant idea. After researching several different manufacturers,this one got some great reviews. It is taller than most others, but the flame effect is very good. Color is not too orange as other brands and the LED is very smooth so the effect is very realistic. In years to come when they make these smaller I will be a huge. For now they are cool,but when turned off they are kind of an eye sore. Of all the ones out there currently, this has to be top 5
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light bulb like this for my outside lamp post for the Christmas holidays. After reading through reviews on various bulbs offered here on amazon, I chose this bulb because it had so many good reviews, even though it was more expensive than others. After receiving it, I placed it in my lamp post, under a frosted shade, and must say that I am extremely happy with this item. It really does look like a real flame burning in the lamp post. I've had several people tell me they saw it and how much they enjoyed seeing it. This bulb works great ... so happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: FM Bob

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product unless you have the ability to turn your light on and off to get the effect you want. There are four modes. I only wanted the flame effect. When I turned the light off and then turned the light back on it was in a different mode, not the flame one. I had to turn the light off and then back on again 3 times to get the flame back. How does that work if it is an outside lamp post on a timer? I returned them and bought ones with just the flame mode.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stauder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look as flamey as the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This may be one of the lights with more realistic flames, but, if so, then there aren't any lights with very realistic flames. To change between the modes one must turn the light off and on very quickly. If you wait a second or two then it will not change mode, but if you do it click-clack there are three modes: flickering (can be stimulating or annoying/distracting), constant (nice blue light, fairly bright), and slow blinking (stimulating without being annoying/distracting). The light is fairly bright for a blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. If I could give 4
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. If I could give 4.5 stars, I would. The only drawback for me is I am using them on my front porch in the coach lamps on either side of my front door and the "flame" effect sometimes gets in sync with each other. So, if you are really paying attention, you can tell that there is a pattern to the "randomness." I will definitely order more. I have one bulb on my back patio door and some mission style lanterns on bookshelves in our family room they will look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Not Working Out Of The Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought a box of two. One of them didn’t work at all right out of the box. Feels very cheaply constructed compared to similar bulbs by different companies. The changing of the features every time the light is turned off/on is annoying. Would be nice if you could set it, but you can’t. I’m going to have to return this, because I’m not going to pay for one working bulb and I have no confidence a replacement would work, either. Very poorly made. Very unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: MagicBendy

customer_reviews.title: It took a while getting here BUT well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand those who say it is too bright. Real flames are bright. Other than having a real torch going this bulb looks like a flame, exactly like a flame, especially in a lamp. The flames dance up and down like a real fire, plus, it uses only one watt and a half and stays totally cool. It amazes me and all those visiting. It is quite THE conversation piece and it will light up a dark room just like a bond fire. I don't mean to ramble but l think of this as an acquisition, not a purchase because it is a find.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Mimics the Movement of Fire
customer_reviews.text: OK I will agree, they don't look like the photos (and the reviews would be better if they were less photo-shopped) but it does mimic the effects of fire pretty well in terms of movement. And it does look pretty cool as the light by my front door. It is NOT very bright so if you need illumination this will not work. Holding up fine in 20-40 degree weather with both rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Orcinus_orca

customer_reviews.title: Instant Fireplace Light
customer_reviews.text: Suddenly we have the flickering light of a fire place in our Florida Living room, most excellent bulb, a little pricey, but very nice. Happy with purchase​.
customer_reviews.author: John Benicy

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best of these flame bulbs at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: I researched these whacky bulbs extensively before purchasing this one. Check out YouTube to see them in action before plunking down your money. They’re all quite different from one another and in my opinion this manufacturer knocked it out of the park. Such a cool effect, especially in a frosted or shaded fixture. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan8er

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if you want a flame bulb sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I call the different modes a BUG not a FEATURE. Every time the power goes out, the mode changes and I cannot use dusk to dawn sensors any more. These "FLAME BULBS" are only flaming 25% of the time!!!! Useless. Does anyone know of a TRULY SINGLE MODE FLAME LED BULB? DIFFERENT MODES ARE FRUSTRATING and NOT NEEDED!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of kinks and low shelf life.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool, although a bit large so it won't fit in some containers such as our patio lantern. At one point it stopped flashing and just was stuck on the basic tungsten color. I had to switch it off then back on again. Also, the biggest problem I had was the light died after using it for less then a week! That's a mighty shirt shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Chrix

customer_reviews.title: Buy more than 1 ..!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent !!! only wish i would have ordered more than one before i told my wife how much i paid it...haaa although she really loves it also..gave 4 stars only because their is another bulb out there that deserves 5 stars..(it has breakaway effect) Honestly would have made that purchase yet they were out of stock.. and this bulb, is simply fantastic!!! it is what you would expect it to be!! Video an or photos DO NOT DO THIS BULB JUSTICE.. to bright to capture the effect seen.. Looks like real flame..!
customer_reviews.author: crash

customer_reviews.title: Blue Flame really isn't a flame...very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the Blue Flame Light Bulbs to put outside of my garage for the Holiday season. After installing them, the bulbs really don't have a flame appearance to them. They are more like lights that flicker in and out. I am very disappointed in looking at the main picture on this product and it looking NOTHING like what I received. BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using mine in freestanding entryway lights that are frosted. I love the warmth that it adds as you walk up to the house. Everyone comments on them. Although a couple of people thought we had a short in our circuit system. Haha. I also have another one in a freestanding post out by the driveway. On this particular one the switch is broken and the light never turns off. So I can vouch for it running 24/7 for the last 2 1/2 months! If they ever burn out I will definitely replace with the same lights.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cooler than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I thought I made a mistake in purchasing these. One had come apart, they both looked like cheap plastics junk. The “broken” one snapped back together and these turned out to be nifty accent lamps that keep the room from being totally dark. These bulbs are pretty, don’t get hot, are seem a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wednesday Lee Friday

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: The flame effect isn’t SUPER natural looking so you’ll definitely want a shade or diffuser. But it’s passable for Halloween decoration. Turning the light off and on to switch between modes (flame, solid, slow strobe) is a cheesy way to do it, but ok. Lumen output feels maybe dimmer than a candle, so don’t expect to light up a room with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ansol

customer_reviews.title: Flame not defined. Too many modes
customer_reviews.text: The flame is not very well defined and looks almost more like a strobe. From a distance it still is cool looking but not quite the flame I was looking for. It has three modes and everytime my daylight sensor goes on then off it flips the light to a different mode. I would like to be able to turn the light off and then back on and have it stay in the flame mode. If you are looking for a true flame look, I would keep looking. The blue seems to be harder to find a true version than the natural flame yellow/orange.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Love it - tried others - this one is a top quality 5 start bulb - best I've tried so far...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bulb - I've tried two others that did not even come close to comparing to this one's effect. Flame "flicker" is a little too fast - like it is up against a stiff wind, but if you just allow it to do it's thing and don't stare at it the effect starts to be more realistic. You CANNOT see the LED's like some of the cheaper versions of this type of bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheelinva

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright, flame-like effect. Color is blue unlike many lights that seem to have a purple look. We purchased to display in window at night in support of a local police officer that was injured. I like that there are multiple selectable patterns/options that change with the flip of a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Only one worked out of my 2pk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 2 pack. Only one worked. The one that does work is what I was expecting. Super cheap and not worth buying if only one is going to end up working. Flipping your light switch is what you use to toggle between the light's various modes. The flip happens automatically when suspended upside down. Purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: JayR.

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this light looks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not entirely sure what some reviewers were complaining about with the flame pattern. I love the way this light looks. It's a pattern, but it's realistic enough to pass for a real flame. I love it and I need to buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: daniel7683

customer_reviews.title: too fast to be "realistic"
customer_reviews.text: great flame look but flicker's too fast to be truly "realistic" I bought this unit because they claim to be a slower flame effect than their competitors, wish they could slow it up even more or create two speeds in the options, also there are no directions on how to cycle thru the options, you have to unscrew it then screw back in within a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Not Great, But "Okay".
customer_reviews.text: Of all the LED versions of the flame bulbs, this one is probably the best, but it's entirely too bright in my opinion. There should be some type of flicker rate & brightness adjustment to make it more realistic or more like classic flame bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryxtek

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these  if you aspect a flame effect
customer_reviews.text: These lights have with flames not much too do. These are yellow crazy flickering LED lights, there is no FLAME effect. These light make you go crazy. I bought 14 of them and send them all back some of them came in two pieces you have to screw them together, very poor quality. Very misleading information about these lights. There is just no flame effect.
customer_reviews.author: Njoy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a candle flickering
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this lightbulb. It looks like a real candle flame. It can also just be solid light (amber). I wish it were brighter but Im so happy with the candle look, I just overlooked the lack of brightness and bought another lamp to use in same room when I need more light.
customer_reviews.author: Cat R.

customer_reviews.title: They look good but feel cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my garage and fit right in with the rest of my Halloween decorations! The bulbs kinda feel like they were cheaply made so im hoping these don't crap out after a few months. I will update this review if they don't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Cropek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Photoshop Skills!?
customer_reviews.text: No, I didn't expect actual flames when I plugged these bulbs in. Yes, I researched it on Amazon, YouTube and the interwebs in general to see what the consensus was on these bulbs before purchase. If you expect a realistic representation of flames via LED technology, consider purchasing a medieval torch sconce and cultivate some bees or use tallow (Keeping in mind fire codes for your local jurisdiction during installation) instead. Overall impression... Underwhelmed. Post Script: This item does not claim, nor infer that it will prevent rabid bear attacks.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I got this for my husbands anniversary gift. He’s been wanting them for years now and we just never did it. I even love these!!! I will be buying more! They are bright and really do look like a fire is going on!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylen

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic flame - and once I learned that it will change from a steady glow to a dancing flame simply by turning the light on, then off, then on again - I could not be more pleased. We have them installed in 2 porch lights where you reach up inside the glass to screw in the bulb. I see no loss of effect with the bulb being installed with the socket on the top instead of the bottom. I wish it was available in a candelabra base so I could use it in our post light. I have always LOVED the gas lights of Charleston - and this is as close as I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Answers to QAs are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Was mis-informed when I asked if they would work upside down and still have the flame going bottom to top. Bulb is nice, but I cant use it for what i intended it for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different then expected but not bad
customer_reviews.text: To me the actual flame didnt look like the picture. It's not bad product, it was just different from what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Impotent lava lamp
customer_reviews.text: Tried it in a hallway for a night light. The flame effect is more like an impotent lava lamp. The top half of the bulb doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Realistic image!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Works exactly as described! Provides a very realistic representation of a burning wick; the motion, the color, and atmosphere all help to represent an open flame. If I need another bulb of this type, I shall definitely order another!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra bux to buy the better one
customer_reviews.text: The neighbors loved this flame light. I used it for Christmas in my lamp post and it really looked good. Several neighbors also said they loved it. A couple of them ask where did you get it.
customer_reviews.author: ReliaStream

customer_reviews.title: This light is a little pricey, But it does really look like fire.
customer_reviews.text: This light is a little pricey, But it does really look like fire.
customer_reviews.author: John Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: and looked great when working
customer_reviews.text: Installed them and one went out within a day. They are part of my lighting system around my garage, and looked great when working. But one day?? Texsens contacted me after my original review....and are replacing the bulb free of charge. Nice to see customer service which cares. Upgraded to 4stars!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Scott Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Really looks like it's burning....
customer_reviews.text: Love it, a bit expensive but it's LED and will last for years. I use it as a night light so the room isn't so dark that I stumble. It gives the effect of a fireplace yet has a very low wattage draw.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Hike66

customer_reviews.title: this bulb in no way mimics the slow varied flickering of a real candle.
customer_reviews.text: the flickering is so fast it looks like a scene from a horror movie. this bulb in no way mimics the slow varied flickering of a real candle.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Flame's pattern look real, but color seems a little too orange/yellow... No the same as real flames Also the pattern is too repetitive... Not natural.
customer_reviews.author: N+B+O

customer_reviews.title: love the blue
customer_reviews.text: We bought them now for our xmas lights that are all blue also. I love how the 3 settings can make it look really nice. My neighbor has his for 1.5 years, so I can't speak for longevity for our lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Looks like a real fireplace when you’re not looking at it. It flickers really nice though so I’m not saying it’s not nice to look at I’m just saying that when you look away from it does have the appearance of a fireplace in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Felling

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT ALREADY!!! Safe torch lighting, looks so real and cool.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love buying another set now. Step back in time before electricity with "torch" lightening. Love this so much.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason you pay a little more, it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. The lighting effect is just like capturing fire. Not the pixelated junk you get from the low cost "great deal" vendors. I have them on my porch and it's like having torch light. I hope they have long life otherwise I'll be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Safe + Practical + Last Long
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I’m the person who really likes to have flare at my bedroom, but my mom won’t allow me to do it. Because she doesn’t trust the candles in her house. Will, thank god I have find this product. I have been using this product for four months and I did not experience any failure in these four months. Which is really safety and practical. I guarantee, it totally worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jun Wang

customer_reviews.title: Flame ON!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Very flame like... I wish the bulb was just 1.5 cm (1/2 inch) narrower - then it would fit standard lamps much better. It does take a surprising amount of time to come on after power is applied as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Unique front outside light
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light even my son comment how the flames inside separates and are demensional. My husband at first was “ahh its just a light” I said but our light is different than everyone else’s. I find my self staring at it because of the flame, a little pricy for a light but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JULA

customer_reviews.title: Neat!
customer_reviews.text: Like ice fire, it's pretty cool with both red and blue complimenting each other in the night. Adds a cool icy ambience!
customer_reviews.author: Greingo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween, not light enough and practical otherwise in our opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone seems to love this and the pictures look great but my entire family thought it reminded us of something from Halloween. It doesn't give off enough light to use as porch lights and looks spooky. We removed ours and stored it away and will break them out in October for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Gratitude

customer_reviews.title: Slow flicker is not very slow
customer_reviews.text: Mom mom loves these types of lights, that simulate fire, so I got her this one as a gift. It said it was a slow flicker, but it looks too fake for indoor use because it's still too fast. This is more suitable for outdoor use. (which is not what I got this for)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I give it ten out of five stars! I ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it ten out of five stars! I swear if I didn’t buy this I would actually think there was a flame in there!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl R

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The flame effect isn't really noticeable unless you're 10 ft away. No clear instructions. Can only flip between two modes, not the four advertised.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: realistic
customer_reviews.text: very calming light. if you can’t physically see the light it looks just like a fire is lit in your room! very romantic type lighting. i turn it on every night and enjoy it a lot. a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: FruityReverb

customer_reviews.title: Good Flickr pattern but needs to have a longer flame.
customer_reviews.text: Bulb has a good Flickr pattern but, still a little fast. I just wish they had a longer bulb to make for a taller flame for a larger lamp fixture because the flame effect is just to close to the base of the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Very Orange.  Did not look good in frosted glass
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go in my outside frosted glass coach light. The flame was very life like, but very, very, very orange. Because of the frosted glass it gave it a weird glow. The light fixture looked like a haunted house. This was not the effect I was going for :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying these flaming lights. I have 2 in the front of the house and 1 on my deck. Lots of light and they are so different.
customer_reviews.author: leswes

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made, and amongst the best out there.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, with none of the LED "dots" that are so often seen in other brands. This is the one to get, if you want a real flame-like appearance. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality.
customer_reviews.author: It's That Guy Phil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic visual effect!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took some time (about 3 weeks) so don't be in a hurry. The light is fantastic, looks like a gas light. Only had it about 2 months so not sure about how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur

customer_reviews.title: 4 Modes? Really just 3
customer_reviews.text: There are no videos on the the internet that can show how amazing this lightbulb is! I bought another one, but this one actually looks like a torch. The other one looked more like a candle. There are 4 "modes": constant, beacon, flame and it can do all of those upside down (the fourth).
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Effects
customer_reviews.text: Installed on our outdoor light, It slowed speeders in the area real fast as they think the flashing blue are police lights. Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: CrankyFuzz

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2 pack. Only one of them worked. It did look nice. 3 functions- steady blue, pulsing, and almost flame like. If both worked, I'd give them a 4 because it just isn't flame like enough. They both rattled to, which is suspicious when it's a bulb.
customer_reviews.author: rustytlc

customer_reviews.title: Really looks like fire
customer_reviews.text: Took quite a long time to receive. Really does look fire, looks great in our light, wish it had a little more white or brightness to it, very, almost too much of an orange glow. So far so good, it was interesting to see info on the web about how these work. I understand why they are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Marysville's Vicki

customer_reviews.title: They are just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier. Everyone comments "You installed a gas lamp?! How lovely!" and because it isn't too bright like the LED bulbs I had in there my neighbors love it. The look like a real gas lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Realtor Mary

customer_reviews.title: The Best FLAME LED LIGHTS ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent the EXTRA Money on these Lights and I am Glad I did.... FANTASTIC DISPLAY looks like flames .... sensational great packing and Speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: RIchard .old man

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchaed these lights specifically for halloween. I love the flickering of the lights and it adds a spooky feel to my outdoor halloween decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent or junk?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these light bulbs, so much I am going to use them again next year. Thank you for such an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned after 7 days
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this bulb. It looked so authentic and exactly how advertised however after only 7 days both bulbs I bought malfunctioned at the same time switching to a strange flashing mode. Considering the price this was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cove

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to mix up this Flame Effect light with others
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to mix up this Flame Effect light with others. This one does NOT flow to the bottom when installed upside down. But otherwise, it is a awesome sight to behold.
customer_reviews.author: D Allison

customer_reviews.title: Effects are awesome.  Color a bit orange
customer_reviews.text: Lights look great. I used them for thanksgiving in my carriage lights with some fall wreaths around them. About 5 people in my neighborhood promptly copied me. They are a bit on the orange side tho. I expected more yellow, like a flame. Oh well. The effects are spot-on tho. Will use for Halloween next year too, but too much orange for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: RDeWit

customer_reviews.title: Cool for projects
customer_reviews.text: Cool for projects. We were building some Steampunk style lights and furniture and these were great!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Jellison

customer_reviews.title: Decent price
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and excellent bulbs ! Make a great addition to any decorating and just home usage !
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice effect, not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these bulbs. Behind frosted glass, the effect is really good. The brightness is way better than I expected. After only a few hours of operation, some of the bulbs quit working while others got stuck in the ‘all on’ setting and would not reset to the flame effect. When they work, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Blue Fire
customer_reviews.text: I love these, bright enough with our being blinding a beautiful color and looks like flames. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: George Gailey

customer_reviews.title: I still like the idea and the look but wish it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not as bright as the picture. It really just "flickers". It was not enough light for my porch. I still like the idea and the look but wish it was brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Debopotamus

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome. My mom wanted a lightbulb that looked like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome. My mom wanted a lightbulb that looked like flames for her outside porch lamp and this is exactly what she was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: A G H

customer_reviews.title: Creates a nice warm light.
customer_reviews.text: I put this bulb behind my bed headboard to add some ambiance to the room. The wife thought I lit the bed on fire. I guess that means this mimics a flame pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Dard001

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cool
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this light it actually looks like flames in my light post and very pleased is a must to buy highly recommend this item the color and the flicker actually looks dead on a flame
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: Looks Exactly like a gas light!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment and excellent product. Looks exactly like a gas flamed light. Numerous neighbors stopped over to compliment and ask when we had a gas line run to our outside garden patio. Few twists of the bulb and voila. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Rob D Klinger

customer_reviews.title: They really do look like dancing firelight
customer_reviews.text: Took about 3 weeks to arrive from China-WORTH THE WAIT!! Now I wish I had ordered 4 rather than 2. They really do look like dancing firelight.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of compliments from this.
customer_reviews.text: Neighbors want to know how I got my front porch lantern to use gas. I told them that it is a really cool lightbulb. Then I told them to get it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell E. Harlow-curtis

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but provides desired effect.
customer_reviews.text: Great light to give the illusion of a gas lamp, but does not illuminate the area around itself very well. Had to add additional lights to ensure steps were light properly while using this bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Scully

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: Worth the wait for sure. Took weeks to get these light bulbs but so happy we did. I set it up in a decorative wood pile inside during Christmas and people thought it was a real fire at first. Guest were amazed and so were we. Great product. Definitely would order it again. Very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: nice, but not exactly like the photos or video
customer_reviews.text: Works well, nice, but not exactly like the photos or video.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas. The look great and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Empty Pockets

customer_reviews.title: how long do they last ?
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs look amazing !!! they look light real flames. compliments, compliments, compliments. And the best part this company stands behind their product. If there s a problem they address it immediately !! I would recommend this to everyone interested to buy this !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JUdy

customer_reviews.title: can be fitted on most of my lamp bought at places like Walmart. I'm very impressed the packaging is so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very vivid flame effect bulb, can be fitted on most of my lamp bought at places like Walmart. I'm very impressed the packaging is so good that the bulb has zero damages during international shipping. It would work best for lamp without cover to see the full flame effect.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Y.

customer_reviews.title: Decent item if constructed properly
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint on this item is the quality of construction. The base of one of the lightbulbs was installed crooked. The light still works, but it does not stand straight up but rather leaning to one side. Otherwise, a decent item.
customer_reviews.author: KBrown

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it looks like a lava lamp
customer_reviews.text: It would look OK if the light fixture has some kind of ornamental feature that partial blocks it so you could get a flame affect. Otherwise it looks like a lava lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Realistic flame effects. Works great. We put this in a yard lamp we have that looks like an old time gas lamp. It looks like real fire. It gives a nice glow that gives enough light to walk the path to the door. Not a lot, but what you would expect from a fire.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: it's not real fire!
customer_reviews.text: It made a neat gimmick gift but it doesn't really mimic fire well.
customer_reviews.author: B Glazer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Acts like an anoying flickering defective light rather than flame
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice !!!
customer_reviews.text: Look very nice and the price is rite. Watch your size of the bulb in relation to your light fixture. These are very tall.
customer_reviews.author: John and Carolyn D

customer_reviews.title: Unintentional strobe light?
customer_reviews.text: In a bedroom lamp the flickering bulb looks more like an orange strobe than soft firelight. In a porchlight it simulates fire so well that we are concerned that neighbors may be alarmed that the apartment is ablaze. I think it all depends on how you use it. Perhaps it would be better with a dark shade.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Reno

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Pure crap
customer_reviews.text: Lights looked like what you’d expect. Used two times first to see, next left it on lasted about 3 mins shorted out and died. Pretty much bought a broken light bulb
customer_reviews.author: Biggestlittlecity

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased another brand and like this one much better. Realistic flame. Very happy with purchase. Have it in a light with a frosted globe. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy kucera

customer_reviews.title: Neat Flame Like Appearance
customer_reviews.text: These led lights are the best out of the bunch if you desire a lifelike flame effect. I purchased four of these. Two for front entry pillars and patio lamps. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for front and rear door.
customer_reviews.text: They add a nice touch because it has four different features that you can choose. We like the torch effect the best.
customer_reviews.author: michael e

product_meta.title: Texsens LED Flame Effect Light Bulbs - 4 Modes LED Flickering Fire Flame with Upside-Down Effect, Simulated Decorative Lights Vintage Flaming Lamp for Halloween/Christmas Decoration/Party/Bar- 2 Pack
product_meta.description:
Color:Yellow Flame| Size:4 MODESTexsens Flame Effect Light Bulb is a magic product warm LED lighting, LED flame bulb 
that like gas flames, let your house look more mysterious and beautiful. 

Power consumption, high-brightness, start instantly. The effect of flame is vivid, 
like a real burning fire. The best gift choice. Shockproof and easy transport.

Texsens flicker flame light bulb can be used broadly in illumination indoors and decorations 
inside and outside, which is an ideal light source for houses, shops, restaurants, disco, 
night club, showrooms, tea house, the building outside, cinemas, wall pillars and gardens etc. 

Power:4W 
LEDs: 99PCS 
Input: AC85-265V 
Bulb Holder: E26 
Light Angle: 270° 
Frequency: 50-60 Hz 
Color temperature: 1600K 
Light Source: 99pcs 2835 led beads 
Operating Temperature: -20℃-+48℃ 

ATTENTIONS: 
1.It have to be used in rated voltage. 
2.Can not be used as emergency light. 
3.Please noted that the fire flame bulbs is non-waterproof. 
4.To be safe when installing and changing lamp, disconnect the electricity first.
feature_bullets: MORE SLOWER SPEED - the speed of the flame effect is slower than other flickering Flame light bulbs in the market. Make it look like a REAL FLAME.
NEWEST 4 MODES Flame Effect- Flame emulatuon mode, Breathing mode, Gravity induced mode, General light mode. You can change the mode through turn on / turn off the Flame Effect Light Bulb.

SAFE & GREEN ENERGY SAVING - Excellent heat dissipation and environmental protect, no harmful substances, no UV and infrared radiation. The input voltage is AC90-265V and the power is 4W. Save 90% of electricity from traditional flame bulbs, save electricity and save money.

AS A GIFT - When the gorgeous festivals are singing, if your friends are upset or do not yet know how to dress up their house, Texsens flame light bulb is the best gift to solve their distress and make their house look more Rich festive atmosphere.
WARRANTY - We offer a 100%, 30-day refund guarantee! Any problems, please feel free to contact our fantastic customer support team for the best solutions in 24 hours.

specifications.Special Features: Flashes as a real fire, 4 modes, flicker more slowly
